channel.title: CVE Feed for SAUTER Controls -- Nova 220 (EYK220F001) DDC with BACnet connection
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SAUTER Controls -- Nova 220 (EYK220F001) DDC with BACnet connection

item.title: CVE-2023-0052|2023-10-26T23:15:06.756Z -- sauter%20controls -- nova%20220%20%28eyk220f001%29%20ddc%20with%20bacnet%20connection
item.description: SAUTER Controls Nova 200â€“220 Series with firmware version 3.3-006 and prior and BACnetstac version 4.2.1 and prior allows the execution of commands without credentials. As Telnet and file transfer protocol (FTP) are the only protocols available for device management, an unauthorized user could access the system and modify the device configuration, which could result in the unauthorized user executing unrestricted malicious commands.
